raw_text: More recently, Schulteim Walde and K ?oper (2013) proposed to distinguish between the three relations antonymy, synonymy and hyponymy based on automatically acquired word patterns. raw_text: 4we set c= 5 in our experiments 342To illustrate our pattern extraction algorithm con sider the following snippet from Google for the query jaguar AND cat.? The Jaguar is the largest cat in Western Hemi sphere and can subdue a larger prey than can the puma? Here, the phrase is the largest indicates a hy pernymic relationship between Jaguar and the cat. Phrases such as also known as, is a, part of, is an ex ample of all indicate various of semantic relations.
